data.content:
Anh - Anh
quercetin
['kwə:sɪtɪn]
■ noun Chemistry a yellow crystalline pigment present in plants, used as a food supplement to reduce allergic responses or boost immunity.
Origin
C19: prob. from L. quercetum 'oak grove' (from quercus 'oak') + -in1.

sentences.en: Onion Onions have anti-inflammatory characteristics. Onions are also a good prevention from cancer because they contain quercetin. Prevention from ulcers is provided by the free radicals. You will also boost your immune system since onions aid the absorption of vitamin C.
sentences.vi: Hành Hành có tính kháng viêm. Hành cũng là ngừa ung thư rất tốt vì chứa quercetin. Các gốc tự do trong hành ngừa lở loét. Hệ miễn dịch cũng sẽ mạnh hơn vì hành giúp hấp thu vi - ta - min C.
